DOC.brief_summary: This open-label , multi-center , three-period , one sequence study investigate effect vemurafenib pharmacokinetics digoxin patient unresectable BRAFV600-mutation positive metastatic melanoma malignant tumor type harbor V600-activating mutation BRAF without acceptable standard treatment option . Patients receive multiple dos vemurafenib Periods B C single dose digoxin Periods A C. Eligible patient option continue treatment vemurafenib part extension study ( NCT01739764 ) . The anticipated time study treatment approximately 36 day .
DOC.brief_title: A Pharmacokinetics Study Investigate Effect Vemurafenib Digoxin Patients With BRAFV600 Mutation-Positive Metastatic Melanoma
